string-array.name: app_changes
string-array.item: • Group sending now works\n• MMS messages now show properly
• Added SMS notifications option\n• Updated to Android P\n• Updated design to Material Design 2.0
• Only watch shows SMS notification now\n• Updated to Material Design 2.0 Icons\n• Greatly reduced app size
• Added custom replies to the app and watch\n• Revamped Wear OS SMS notification\n• Bug Fixes
• Added ability to change conversation colors from phone app\n• Bug Fixes
• Watch app handles premium independently\n• Fixed order of messages on phone app\n• Bug Fixes

resources.string: The location permission allows for the automatic theme mode to more accurately calculate sunset and sunrise times so that the app can change from light to dark and dark to light more precisely.
Enable PermissionITEM_SEP1234567890ITEM_SEPPhone needs permission to read messagesITEM_SEPaaaaaaITEM_SEP5ITEM_SEPfalse
Enable PermissionITEM_SEPPhone needs permission to read messagesITEM_SEPITEM_SEPITEM_SEP
The app cannot function without these permissions
The WearOS SMS app is free, but to truly take advantage of it and do things like send messages, create replies, or theme the app, premium mode must be purchased.
Thank you for purchasing premium! More features are on the way so your purchase will only become more valuable! Hope you enjoy the app and let me know if you have any issues!
Local app theme to make the app more comfortable to use.
Global theme color that applies to the WearOS app as well.
These are the conversations that the app can see and tries to send to the watch, useful for debugging. You can open them to debug individual conversations.
No replies found! Create a reply using the + button. Replies can be used on the watch to quickly and efficiently send messages.

Unfortunately, due to Google SMS permission policy, Wearable SMS was removed from the Google Play Store. However, I have chosen to open source Wearable SMS and make it open source (which means it is now free).

To continue using: Go to GitHub with the button below to download the update to the apps.

As was mentioned previously, the app will now be free, so if you would like to contribute to future development, a PayPal donation is very much appreciated.Thank you and feel free to leave issues for feature requests.You can email me at nick@nicknackdevelopment.com if you have any questions.
